title: Fs t206 Sam Crawford psa 1 Tolstoy ghost image
author: Maculay1979

posts.post_title: Fs t206 Sam Crawford psa 1 Tolstoy ghost image
posts.post_content: Best offers considered.  Appears this is a wet sheet transfer.  Asking 500 OBO.  Also willing to trade.
Open to offers card and cash deals as well
Is this a ghost image?  Or a wet sheet transfer from a card sitting atop it while not fully dry yet?
Just a WST transfer.  They're very common with Tolstoi backs.
Price lowered in half.  Willing to deal
